programme.title: Marooned
Svemirski putnici
programme.desc:
Marooned: Directed by John Sturges. With Gregory Peck, Richard Crenna, David Janssen, James Franciscus. Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0064639/","name":"Marooned","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzMyNmFhMTMtNGMwMC00NjZjLTlkMzctYWYyODA2NTg3ZTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1NTQ0NDg@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000060/","name":"Gregory Peck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001077/","name":"Richard Crenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418148/","name":"David Janssen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836328/","name":"John Sturges"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041487/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800294/","name":"Mayo Simon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128780/","name":"Martin Caidin"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1568784665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NmNmMDAtMWI4My00ZmZiLTk3NGMtYmQwM2Y5ZGIwNGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NmNmMDAtMWI4My00ZmZiLTk3NGMtYmQwM2Y5ZGIwNGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"1969-12-11","description":"Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?","keywords":"astronaut,rescue,outer space,marooned,cosmonaut","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0064639/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Uthman"},"dateCreated":"2002-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb script and cast stand test of time","reviewBody":"TiVo recorded this as a "suggestion" recently, and I realized that I

had never seen the film before. MAROONED was released in the

science fiction film dark age that stretched between 2001 and

STAR WARS, so I wasn't expecting much. In fact, MAROONED is a

gripping film from the beginning. The cast, headed by Gregory

Peck (geez, do we miss positive male authority figures like him!) is

uniformly outstanding. We get to see a young Gene Hackman,

years before his breakout in THE FRENCH CONNECTION, and

career-best performances from David Jansen, Mariette Hartley,

Richard Crenna, and James Franciscus.

The production values are first-rate, and the scenes set in NASA

facilities on the ground are the most realistic ever filmed, better

even than APOLLO 13. NASA apparatchiks sling around enough

acronyms to fill a family-sized box of Alpha Bits, and die-hard fans

of space travel won't be disappointed in the technical detail.

 The pan & scan print I saw on Cinemax was superb; it looked

brand new. The sound was pretty much what one would expect in

an average flick from the late 1960s. 

I have rated this film as an '8', a grade I rarely give. I would have

ranked it higher but for a draggy ending with cheesy EVA effects. I

still recommend this film highly, even for those with no particular

interest in space travel or science fiction. The dramatic core is

what drives this film, and there is no disappointment there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0064639/","name":"Marooned","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzMyNmFhMTMtNGMwMC00NjZjLTlkMzctYWYyODA2NTg3ZTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1NTQ0NDg@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000060/","name":"Gregory Peck","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001077/","name":"Richard Crenna","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418148/","name":"David Janssen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836328/","name":"John Sturges"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041487/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800294/","name":"Mayo Simon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128780/","name":"Martin Caidin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1568784665","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NmNmMDAtMWI4My00ZmZiLTk3NGMtYmQwM2Y5ZGIwNGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NmNmMDAtMWI4My00ZmZiLTk3NGMtYmQwM2Y5ZGIwNGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","datePublished":"1969-12-11","description":"Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?","keywords":"astronaut,rescue,outer space,marooned,cosmonaut","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0064639/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Uthman","dateCreated":"2002-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb script and cast stand test of time","reviewBody":"TiVo recorded this as a "suggestion" recently, and I realized that I

had never seen the film before. MAROONED was released in the

science fiction film dark age that stretched between 2001 and

STAR WARS, so I wasn't expecting much. In fact, MAROONED is a

gripping film from the beginning. The cast, headed by Gregory

Peck (geez, do we miss positive male authority figures like him!) is

uniformly outstanding. We get to see a young Gene Hackman,

years before his breakout in THE FRENCH CONNECTION, and

career-best performances from David Jansen, Mariette Hartley,

Richard Crenna, and James Franciscus.

The production values are first-rate, and the scenes set in NASA

facilities on the ground are the most realistic ever filmed, better

even than APOLLO 13. NASA apparatchiks sling around enough

acronyms to fill a family-sized box of Alpha Bits, and die-hard fans

of space travel won't be disappointed in the technical detail.

 The pan & scan print I saw on Cinemax was superb; it looked

brand new. The sound was pretty much what one would expect in

an average flick from the late 1960s. 

I have rated this film as an '8', a grade I rarely give. I would have

ranked it higher but for a draggy ending with cheesy EVA effects. I

still recommend this film highly, even for those with no particular

interest in space travel or science fiction. The dramatic core is

what drives this film, and there is no disappointment there.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"duration":"PT2H14M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wonderwall
Wonderwall
programme.desc: Wonderwall: Directed by Joe Massot. With Jack MacGowran, Jane Birkin, Irene Handl, Richard Wattis. The eccentric professor Oscar Collins lives completely secluded in his chaotic apartment. When a model (Penny Lane) and her photographer boyfriend move in next to him, he becomes fascinated with her. He drills holes in the walls and ceiling and peeps on her day and night. He loses himself in daydreams and delusions." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0065224/","name":"Wonderwall","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVjMDkxYTMtZjY3Yi00MGNhLWI5MDAtNTYzNGZjMDVjYTBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYyMTYxMzk@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532290/","name":"Jack MacGowran"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000945/","name":"Jane Birkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0359566/","name":"Irene Handl"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557543/","name":"Joe Massot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103330/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102722/","name":"Gérard Brach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0127788/","name":"Guillermo Cabrera Infante"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wonderwall","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3697586457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyMjBiNTEtNzJkZS00NzFmLTg2N2EtNTkxNWIwZTNmNDIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyMjBiNTEtNzJkZS00NzFmLTg2N2EtNTkxNWIwZTNmNDIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Wonderwall"},"datePublished":"1969-01-12","description":"The eccentric professor Oscar Collins lives completely secluded in his chaotic apartment. When a model (Penny Lane) and her photographer boyfriend move in next to him, he becomes fascinated with her. He drills holes in the walls and ","keywords":"swinging london,model,dream sequence,isolation,psychedelic","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0065224/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bobbycormier"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"THE psychedelic masterpiece","reviewBody":"for me, the psychedelic equivalent of Citizen Kane must either be Wonderwall or else Conrad Rooks' Chappaqua. this film must be THE psychedelic masterpiece. it comes with incredible credentials. just check the credits. i was recently watching it with james t. rao (from the band Orange Cake Mix) & he said, "wow, this must be the BEST psychedelic film!" & we've watched almost EVERY film of this genre. don't take LSD & watch the film. or DO take LSD & watch the film. you'll find very little difference. the plot is touching & sentimental but with an edge. the "message" of this wonderful art film is complex & multi-layered & manifold. watch it a few times & see new things each time. "it's the lanolin that does it." the color is gorgeous. the DVD extras are incredible & include the director's first film (a short).\n\n-bobby cormier","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":699,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gray Lady Down
Podmornica Neptun
programme.desc: Gray Lady Down: Directed by David Greene. With Charlton Heston, David Carradine, Stacy Keach, Ned Beatty. A Navy Captain uses his experimental Snark to reach a nuclear submarine stuck on an ocean ledge." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077629/","name":"Gray Lady Down","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JhYzMyOGYtOTJmNS00MmJiLWIxZTAtM2M2OGViNDkzOTc1L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQzNDI3NzY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000032/","name":"Charlton Heston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001016/","name":"David Carradine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005078/","name":"Stacy Keach"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338719/","name":"David Greene"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011112/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491735/","name":"David Lavallee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926436/","name":"James Whittaker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755274/","name":"Howard Sackler"}],"description":"A Navy Captain uses his experimental Snark to reach a nuclear submarine stuck on an ocean ledge.","keywords":"underwater scene,self sacrifice,nuclear submarine,submarine,collision","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0077629/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ranger27"},"dateCreated":"2007-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"job-oriented","reviewBody":"I remember seeing this movie in the theater when it came out and the review in Time magazine. OK I remember one part of what was a positive review. It said that the movie avoids the bane of the disaster genre, the subplot. The best sentence in the review that I think describes the movie perfectly is," It is a job-oriented movie about job-oriented men." I can't think of a better way to describe it. The actors give there best professional naval officer performances (well maybe not Carradine...good performance...not sure about the naval officer part) and the movie sticks its subject, the rescue. An entertaining movie that delivers a straightforward story and there is nothing wrong with that.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2899,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0064639/","name":"Marooned","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzMyNmFhMTMtNGMwMC00NjZjLTlkMzctYWYyODA2NTg3ZTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1NTQ0NDg@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000060/","name":"Gregory Peck","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001077/","name":"Richard Crenna","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418148/","name":"David Janssen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836328/","name":"John Sturges"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041487/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800294/","name":"Mayo Simon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128780/","name":"Martin Caidin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1568784665","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NmNmMDAtMWI4My00ZmZiLTk3NGMtYmQwM2Y5ZGIwNGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NmNmMDAtMWI4My00ZmZiLTk3NGMtYmQwM2Y5ZGIwNGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","datePublished":"1969-12-11","description":"Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?","keywords":"astronaut,rescue,outer space,marooned,cosmonaut","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0064639/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Uthman","dateCreated":"2002-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb script and cast stand test of time","reviewBody":"TiVo recorded this as a "suggestion" recently, and I realized that I

had never seen the film before. MAROONED was released in the

science fiction film dark age that stretched between 2001 and

STAR WARS, so I wasn't expecting much. In fact, MAROONED is a

gripping film from the beginning. The cast, headed by Gregory

Peck (geez, do we miss positive male authority figures like him!) is

uniformly outstanding. We get to see a young Gene Hackman,

years before his breakout in THE FRENCH CONNECTION, and

career-best performances from David Jansen, Mariette Hartley,

Richard Crenna, and James Franciscus.

The production values are first-rate, and the scenes set in NASA

facilities on the ground are the most realistic ever filmed, better

even than APOLLO 13. NASA apparatchiks sling around enough

acronyms to fill a family-sized box of Alpha Bits, and die-hard fans

of space travel won't be disappointed in the technical detail.

 The pan & scan print I saw on Cinemax was superb; it looked

brand new. The sound was pretty much what one would expect in

an average flick from the late 1960s. 

I have rated this film as an '8', a grade I rarely give. I would have

ranked it higher but for a draggy ending with cheesy EVA effects. I

still recommend this film highly, even for those with no particular

interest in space travel or science fiction. The dramatic core is

what drives this film, and there is no disappointment there.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"duration":"PT2H14M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Judge Priest
Sudija Prist
programme.desc: Judge Priest: Directed by John Ford. With Will Rogers, Tom Brown, Anita Louise, Henry B. Walthall. Judge Priest, a proud Confederate veteran, uses common sense and considerable humanity to dispense justice in a small town in the Post-Bellum Kentucky." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0025335/","name":"Judge Priest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM0NGVhZWYtNTQyZi00YjExLWE0N2QtNmFhYjVlY2Y3NjJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0737259/","name":"Will Rogers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114805/","name":"Tom Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0521937/","name":"Anita Louise"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000406/","name":"John Ford"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028775/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167769/","name":"Irvin S. Cobb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629580/","name":"Dudley Nichols"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0873707/","name":"Lamar Trotti"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unsung Black Heroes of Film History","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3346055449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzZjhkN2YtZjM0Yy00NzEyLWIzYjItZTI3NmU4OTljZDk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzZjhkN2YtZjM0Yy00NzEyLWIzYjItZTI3NmU4OTljZDk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, we celebrate four unsung Black heroes of film history and four films to watch to get to know them better."},"datePublished":"1934-09-28","description":"Judge Priest, a proud Confederate veteran, uses common sense and considerable humanity to dispense justice in a small town in the Post-Bellum Kentucky.","keywords":"judge,confederate,kentucky,post bellum,small town","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0025335/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zetes"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent Ford/Will Rogers film!","reviewBody":"This film is pure Ford, so, if you're a fan, definitely seek it out. Will Rogers plays the title character, a relaxed judge in a small, Southern town at the end of the 19th Century. He's a kind man with a homespun sense of justice. Others in the legal profession around him disdain him for his casualness, and Judge Priest dislikes their rigid sense of formality. The film opens with the dour Berton Churchill (best known for playing the wicked banker in Stagecoach) prosecuting an ignorant black man, Jeff, for stealing chickens. Jeff claims that he was out fishing for catfish at the time he is supposed to have nabbed the poultry. This activity excites Judge Priest so much that he lets Jeff go and they both go off fishing for catfish. Jeff afterwards becomes his servant. The plot of this film, which was the kernel for the plot of Ford's later (and lesser) Young Mr. Lincoln, involves a stabbing in self-defense. Judge Priest's young nephew, Jerome, back from law school, takes it up as his first case. The courtroom scenes are good for courtroom scenes, but that was never what interested me. The sense of Southern nostalgia, which I love so much from William Faulkner, is enveloping in this film. Will Rogers' kind judge is such a good character. He apparently improvised most of his dialogue, which was his style. He speaks slowly, but with conviction. It's a very good performance. People will certainly object to the treatment and characterization of black characters in the film. This is more just a product of the times, and it doesn't worry me much. Besides, I really found Judge Priest's interactions with Jeff and his maid, Dilsey (played by Gone with the Wind's Hattie McDaniel), touching. Aunt Dilsey, as she is called, is also the name of one of Faulkner's more memorable characters, the black maid in The Sound and the Fury. She and Will Rogers actually have quite a fantastic duet at one point. Rogers also sings with McDaniel and a few other black women, as well. 9/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2059,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H20M"}</script><metacontent="

Will Rogers plays the title character, a relaxed judge in a small, Southern town at the end of the 19th Century. He's a kind man with a homespun sense of justice. Others in the legal profession around him disdain him for his casualness, and Judge Priest dislikes their rigid sense of formality. The film opens with the dour Berton Churchill (best known for playing the wicked banker in Stagecoach) prosecuting an ignorant black man, Jeff, for stealing chickens. This activity excites Judge Priest so much that he lets Jeff go and they both go off fishing for catfish. Jeff afterwards becomes his servant. The plot of this film, which was the kernel for the plot of Ford's later (and lesser) Young Mr. Lincoln, involves a stabbing in self-defense. Judge Priest's young nephew, Jerome, back from law school, takes it up as his first case. The courtroom scenes are good for courtroom scenes, but that was never what interested me. The sense of Southern nostalgia, which I love so much from William Faulkner, is enveloping in this film. Will Rogers' kind judge is such a good character. programme.title: Kuhle Wampe oder: Wem gehört die Welt
Kuhle Wampe or Who Owns the World?
programme.desc: Kuhle Wampe oder: Wem gehört die Welt?: Directed by Slatan Dudow. With Hertha Thiele, Ernst Busch, Martha Wolter, Adolf Fischer. During Great Depression, a family is evicted from their apartment and with no other option they move to a tent camp called Kuhle Wampe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0023104/","name":"Kuhle Wampe oder: Wem gehört die Welt?","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzhjMmY0MDgtNDQ5ZS00Y2Y2LWE1MGMtMTU4ODRjN2VlZTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzg1ODEwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007229/","name":"Hertha Thiele"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123972/","name":"Ernst Busch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0938753/","name":"Martha Wolter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240201/","name":"Slatan Dudow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142233/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068224/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0106517/","name":"Bertolt Brecht"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653346/","name":"Ernst Ottwald"}],"datePublished":"1932-05-30","description":"During Great Depression, a family is evicted from their apartment and with no other option they move to a tent camp called Kuhle Wampe.","keywords":"working class family,working class,unemployment,solidarity,capitalism","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0023104/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wmartin7"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slatan Dudow's film classic not to be missed","reviewBody":"This is a great film, an early example of fiction film-making that is responsive to social and political circumstances, but that doesn't get bogged down in the naturalist pessimism of, say, Piel Jutzi's contemporary "Mutter Krausens Fahrt ins Glück." The cinematography may not be the most compelling, but it is sensitive, considered, and bears the mark of Dudow's admiration for Eisenstein. Brecht was only one of the collaborators on the script -- together with the reportage-novelist Ernst Ottwalt, even if he was its most outspoken defender in the censorship proceedings; and the idea for the film was Dudow's, a Bulgarian-born theater and film director who had made one documentary prior to "Kuhle Wampe" and would go on to co-found the East German studio, DEFA.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":661,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Hindenburg
Hindenburg
programme.desc:
The Hindenburg: Directed by Robert Wise. With George C. Scott, Anne Bancroft, William Atherton, Roy Thinnes. A film that chronicles the events of the Hindenburg disaster in which a zeppelin burst into flames." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0073113/","name":"The Hindenburg","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM1ZWMxM2UtZTRkNC00Y2M3LTg3NWUtOGYyNDFlYTE1OWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4MjA5MzA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001715/","name":"George C. Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000843/","name":"Anne Bancroft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040472/","name":"William Atherton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936404/","name":"Robert Wise"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044494/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506087/","name":"Richard Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512894/","name":"William Link"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0600760/","name":"Michael M. Mooney"}],"datePublished":"1975-12-25","description":"A film that chronicles the events of the Hindenburg disaster in which a zeppelin burst into flames.","keywords":"airship,hindenburg disaster,year 1937,tragic ending,explosion","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0073113/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"smithy-8"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Hindenburg Flies","reviewBody":"The director, Robert Wise, made a very good movie on the Zeppelin disaster, the Hinderburg. The movie's only flaw is that almost everyone has an American accent. The language familiarity looses authenticity. You can't tell the difference from the Americans to the Germans. The American actors should have used German accents. 

The superb cast is headed by George C. Scott,Anne Bancroft, and Charles Durning. It is fun to see many television actors get their chance to be in a good movie. Rene Auberjonois, Robert Clary, Roy Thinnes, and Joanne Cook Moore shine. Only William Atherton was able to make several good movies as a supporting actor. 

After all these years, nobody knows the truth on the Hindenburg disaster. However, the movie tells an interesting story. The movie's version sounds compelling. They claim the Hinderburg was blown up by a saboteur.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5461,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

Mooney"],"datePublished":"1975-12-25","description":"A film that chronicles the events of the Hindenburg disaster in which a zeppelin burst into flames.","keywords":"airship,hindenburg disaster,year 1937,tragic ending,explosion","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0073113/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"smithy-8","dateCreated":"2004-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Hindenburg Flies","reviewBody":"The director, Robert Wise, made a very good movie on the Zeppelin disaster, the Hinderburg. The movie's only flaw is that almost everyone has an American accent. The language familiarity looses authenticity. You can't tell the difference from the Americans to the Germans. The American actors should have used German accents. 

The superb cast is headed by George C. Scott,Anne Bancroft, and Charles Durning. It is fun to see many television actors get their chance to be in a good movie. Rene Auberjonois, Robert Clary, Roy Thinnes, and Joanne Cook Moore shine. Only William Atherton was able to make several good movies as a supporting actor. 

After all these years, nobody knows the truth on the Hindenburg disaster. However, the movie tells an interesting story. The movie's version sounds compelling. They claim the Hinderburg was blown up by a saboteur.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5461,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"duration":"PT2H5M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Battle of Britain
Bitka za Britaniju
programme.desc:
Battle of Britain: Directed by Guy Hamilton. With Harry Andrews, Michael Caine, Trevor Howard, Curd Jürgens. In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0064072/","name":"Battle of Britain","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY1NmY1MzUtOTgwYy00Mzk0LThkNzgtZGRhNWU4NmFmYzMyL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQzNDI3NzY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"G","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002145/","name":"Trevor Howard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0028674/","name":"Harry Andrews"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0357891/","name":"Guy Hamilton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019785/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447860/","name":"James Kennaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0337311/","name":"Wilfred Greatorex"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2471864/","name":"Derek Dempster"}],"datePublished":"1969-09-16","description":"In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K.","keywords":"raf,luftwaffe,royal air force,world war two,air battle","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0064072/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blanche-2"},"dateCreated":"2012-05-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"an important moment in history","reviewBody":"The "Battle of Britain" was one of the most critical battles of World War II, and was fought against Germany by the RAF. The German Luftwaffe planes way outnumbered what the RAF had -- something like 640 vs. 2500 - astonishing - but the RAF went ahead anyway to keep Germany from invading their country.

I'm not a World War II expert, though I'm sure there are plenty of them who have seen this film and posted a review, so I'll leave the critiques about whether or not this was a realistically told story to them.

In my own opinion, it was a lot of stars without much to do and some fantastic aerial battles. The stars include Michael Caine, Trevor Howard (replacing Rex Harrison), Harry Andrews, Laurence Olivier, Ralph Richardson, Christopher Plummer, Ian McShane, Curt Jergens, Kenneth More, Nigel Patrick, Michael Redgrave, Robert Shaw, Susannah York, Robert Flemyng, and Edward Fox. Dirk Bogarde must have been on vacation. Timothy Dalton auditioned for a role but did not get it; Alec Guinness was to play a role that was eventually cut from the script. An astonishing cast.

Characters therefore weren't fully developed - there were so many of them - but the real story is in the skies where the battles rage, with some very exciting flight sequences as well as some glorious scenery. Filming took place in England and Spain.

For some history of the film, I suggest the "trivia" section here, which goes into the collecting of the planes and cites scenes based on real incidents.

If you like World War II films, this sprawling tribute to the RAF is for you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21259,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0064072, Title: Battle of Britain, --- Description: Battle of Britain: Directed by Guy Hamilton. With Harry Andrews, Michael Caine, Trevor Howard, Curd Jürgens. In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0064072/","name":"Battle of Britain","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY1NmY1MzUtOTgwYy00Mzk0LThkNzgtZGRhNWU4NmFmYzMyL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQzNDI3NzY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"G","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002145/","name":"Trevor Howard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0028674/","name":"Harry Andrews"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0357891/","name":"Guy Hamilton"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019785/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447860/","name":"James Kennaway","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0337311/","name":"Wilfred Greatorex","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2471864/","name":"Derek Dempster"],"datePublished":"1969-09-16","description":"In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle to prevent the Luftwaffe from gaining air superiority over the English Channel as a prelude to a possible Axis invasion of the U.K.","keywords":"raf,luftwaffe,royal air force,world war two,air battle","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0064072/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blanche-2","dateCreated":"2012-05-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"an important moment in history","reviewBody":"The "Battle of Britain" was one of the most critical battles of World War II, and was fought against Germany by the RAF. The German Luftwaffe planes way outnumbered what the RAF had -- something like 640 vs. 2500 - astonishing - but the RAF went ahead anyway to keep Germany from invading their country.

I'm not a World War II expert, though I'm sure there are plenty of them who have seen this film and posted a review, so I'll leave the critiques about whether or not this was a realistically told story to them.

In my own opinion, it was a lot of stars without much to do and some fantastic aerial battles. The stars include Michael Caine, Trevor Howard (replacing Rex Harrison), Harry Andrews, Laurence Olivier, Ralph Richardson, Christopher Plummer, Ian McShane, Curt Jergens, Kenneth More, Nigel Patrick, Michael Redgrave, Robert Shaw, Susannah York, Robert Flemyng, and Edward Fox. Dirk Bogarde must have been on vacation. Timothy Dalton auditioned for a role but did not get it; Alec Guinness was to play a role that was eventually cut from the script. An astonishing cast.

Characters therefore weren't fully developed - there were so many of them - but the real story is in the skies where the battles rage, with some very exciting flight sequences as well as some glorious scenery. Filming took place in England and Spain.

For some history of the film, I suggest the "trivia" section here, which goes into the collecting of the planes and cites scenes based on real incidents.

If you like World War II films, this sprawling tribute to the RAF is for you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21259,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hotel sa 7 zvezdica
programme.desc: Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole... Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole radoznalosti finansijske policije, a upravnik se trudi da sačuva fotelju. Uz razne zgode i nezgode, kroz hotel defiluje čitava galerija prevaranata, lažnih milionera i lovaca u mutnom.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

credits.actor: Jelisaveta Sablić, Nikola Simić, Mirka Vasiljević, Zijah Sokolović, Marija Karan

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca,... Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Pare ili život
programme.desc: "Pare ili život" prati glavne likove iz istoimene serije i njihovu nezaboravnu ljetnju avanturu u najljepšim predelima crnogorskog Primorja. "Pare ili život" je dramska, komična TV serija koja prati nekoliko različitih karaktera u sudaru s našom svakodnevnicom. Dramski realizam ove serije nekad se graniči s apsurdom, ali oslobođen je humora po svaku cenu i radije problematizuje neke socijalne fenomene. U društvu koje priželjkuje da je tranzicija već gotova, a ona tek što je počela, javljaju se brojne zamke za sve one koji se "nisu snašli". A Miki, Džoni, Višnja, Sunčica, Marun, Maja i Časlav, nisu sposobni da u novim okolnostima uspeju poput oca njihovog prijatelja Gagija. Razlozi za to nisu ni vaspitanje, ni "devedesete", ni komunizam (pa toliki zakleti komunisti veoma lako su postali uspešni kapitalisti). Na putu do uspeha smetaju im veliko srce i slab stomak. Svi njihovi poduhvati tužni su do smeha, jer je svako raspet između prevaziđenog osećanja zajedništva i želje za ličnim uspehom. Ipak, kad se u njihovim životima pojavi raspevani sanjar Džoni, počinje da se stvara jedna čudna porodica gde svi oni, hteli to ili ne, ostvaruju mnogo jače veze od onih rodbinskih. I usput dobijaju možda mnogo vredniju nagradu od one za kojom sve vreme jure.

programme.title: Ljubav u zaledju
Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: Ljubav u zaledju: Created by Diana Peckaj Vukovic. With Maja Noveljic-Romcevic, Filip Juricic, Iva Viskovic, Ksenija Pajic. Family saga about three families, all living in city of Zagreb, and all connected with love towards European football.(40 min)" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0482074/","name":"Ljubav u zaledju","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGExNjhhOGEtYjA5Ny00NzQxLWE3NTQtMDM3MDg5OTk4ODU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwMTIwODc@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama","Romance","Sport"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1059092/","name":"Maja Noveljic-Romcevic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1251869/","name":"Filip Juricic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2060274/","name":"Iva Viskovic"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158919/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2059678/","name":"Diana Peckaj Vukovic"}],"datePublished":"2005-10-03","description":"Family saga about three families, all living in city of Zagreb, and all connected with love towards European football.(40 min)","keywords":"love","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0482074/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"en_extasis"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"LJUBAV U ZALEDJU (Love in the Offside)","reviewBody":"LOVE IN THE OFFSIDE is the exciting Croatian Telenovela. It is a family story placed in the recognizable urban area of Zagreb. The story centers around two generations of three families connected by football. The show follows the lives of four young men from the suburbs, which grew up playing football. Two of them became professional football players, one became a successful coach and one became a manager. At the peak of his career, one of the youths was tragically killed, while the other three went their separate ways. The drama begins 25 years later, when they all returned to Zagreb. In addition to having football and their past in common, the characters find themselves in complex emotional relations. At the same time, the show follows the lives of their children, which were unavoidably affected by football and burdened with their parents' past. The center of the story is the love of two young people, a football player Marko Marusic and painter Nina Radic. Due to different surroundings and what seem to be incompatible life styles, their love story is very turbulent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":262,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8}}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Jelisaveta Sablić, Nikola Simić, Mirka Vasiljević, Zijah Sokolović, Marija Karan

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Pare ili život
programme.desc: "Pare ili život" prati glavne likove iz istoimene serije i njihovu nezaboravnu ljetnju avanturu u najljepšim predelima crnogorskog Primorja. "Pare ili život" je dramska, komična TV serija koja prati nekoliko različitih karaktera u sudaru s našom svakodnevnicom. Dramski realizam ove serije nekad se graniči s apsurdom, ali oslobođen je humora po svaku cenu i radije problematizuje neke socijalne fenomene. U društvu koje priželjkuje da je tranzicija već gotova, a ona tek što je počela, javljaju se brojne zamke za sve one koji se "nisu snašli". A Miki, Džoni, Višnja, Sunčica, Marun, Maja i Časlav, nisu sposobni da u novim okolnostima uspeju poput oca njihovog prijatelja Gagija. Razlozi za to nisu ni vaspitanje, ni "devedesete", ni komunizam (pa toliki zakleti komunisti veoma lako su postali uspešni kapitalisti). Na putu do uspeha smetaju im veliko srce i slab stomak. Svi njihovi poduhvati tužni su do smeha, jer je svako raspet između prevaziđenog osećanja zajedništva i želje za ličnim uspehom. Ipak, kad se u njihovim životima pojavi raspevani sanjar Džoni, počinje da se stvara jedna čudna porodica gde svi oni, hteli to ili ne, ostvaruju mnogo jače veze od onih rodbinskih. I usput dobijaju možda mnogo vredniju nagradu od one za kojom sve vreme jure.

programme.title: Hotel sa 7 zvezdica
programme.desc: Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole... Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole radoznalosti finansijske policije, a upravnik se trudi da sačuva fotelju. Uz razne zgode i nezgode, kroz hotel defiluje čitava galerija prevaranata, lažnih milionera i lovaca u mutnom.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

credits.actor: Jelisaveta Sablić, Nikola Simić, Mirka Vasiljević, Zijah Sokolović, Marija Karan

Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Idealne veze
programme.desc: Prvi put u našim serijama zavirićemo iza kulisa jednog umjetničkog braka. On je velika glumačka zvijezda, slavljen i tražen na sve strane, željan da bar u sopstvenoj kući nađe neophodan mir. Ona je... Prvi put u našim serijama zavirićemo iza kulisa jednog umjetničkog braka. On je velika glumačka zvijezda, slavljen i tražen na sve strane, željan da bar u sopstvenoj kući nađe neophodan mir. Ona je mlada i atraktivna glumica, željna uzbuđenja, uvijek spremna na akciju.

programme.title: Hotel sa 7 zvezdica
programme.desc: Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole... Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole radoznalosti finansijske policije, a upravnik se trudi da sačuva fotelju. Uz razne zgode i nezgode, kroz hotel defiluje čitava galerija prevaranata, lažnih milionera i lovaca u mutnom.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

credits.actor: Jelisaveta Sablić, Nikola Simić, Mirka Vasiljević, Zijah Sokolović, Marija Karan

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a

programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Idealne veze
programme.desc: Prvi put u našim serijama zavirićemo iza kulisa jednog umjetničkog braka. On je velika glumačka zvijezda, slavljen i tražen na sve strane, željan da bar u sopstvenoj kući nađe neophodan mir. Ona je... Prvi put u našim serijama zavirićemo iza kulisa jednog umjetničkog braka. On je velika glumačka zvijezda, slavljen i tražen na sve strane, željan da bar u sopstvenoj kući nađe neophodan mir. Ona je mlada i atraktivna glumica, željna uzbuđenja, uvijek spremna na akciju.

programme.title: Hotel sa 7 zvezdica
programme.desc: Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole radoznalosti finansijske policije, a upravnik se trudi da sačuva fotelju. Uz razne zgode i nezgode, kroz hotel defiluje čitava galerija prevaranata, lažnih milionera i lovaca u mutnom.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: Dramska serija Ljubav u zaleđu obiteljska je priča čija se radnja odvija u prepoznatljivoj zagrebačkoj urbanoj sredini. U središtu priče dva su naraštaja triju obitelji povezanih nogometom. Dramska serija Ljubav u zaleđu obiteljska je priča čija se radnja odvija u prepoznatljivoj zagrebačkoj urbanoj sredini. U središtu priče dva su naraštaja triju obitelji povezanih nogometom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz nogomet. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao nogometaši, jedan je postao uspješan trener, a posljednji je u menedžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane. Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovno u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže nogomet i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Usporedno pratimo i živote njihove djece, koji su odrastali pod utjecajem nogometa, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je, dakako, ljubav dvoje mladih, nogometaša Marka Marušića i slikarice Nine Radić. Njihova je ljubavna priča puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

credits.actor: Jelisaveta Sablić, Nikola Simić, Mirka Vasiljević, Zijah Sokolović, Marija Karan

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Idealne veze
programme.desc: Prvi put u našim serijama zavirićemo iza kulisa jednog umjetničkog braka. On je velika glumačka zvijezda, slavljen i tražen na sve strane, željan da bar u sopstvenoj kući nađe neophodan mir. Ona je... Prvi put u našim serijama zavirićemo iza kulisa jednog umjetničkog braka. On je velika glumačka zvijezda, slavljen i tražen na sve strane, željan da bar u sopstvenoj kući nađe neophodan mir. Ona je mlada i atraktivna glumica, željna uzbuđenja, uvijek spremna na akciju.

programme.title: Hotel sa 7 zvezdica
programme.desc: Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole... Naziv serije je asocijacija na sedam glavnih likova, sedam radnika starog beogradskog hotela koji je stecište sumnjivih tipova i paravan za razne mutne poslove. Zaposleni pokušavaju da odole radoznalosti finansijske policije, a upravnik se trudi da sačuva fotelju. Uz razne zgode i nezgode, kroz hotel defiluje čitava galerija prevaranata, lažnih milionera i lovaca u mutnom.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

credits.actor: Jelisaveta Sablić, Nikola Simić, Mirka Vasiljević, Zijah Sokolović, Marija Karan

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca,... Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. to death of reading reviews starting with 'I was a massive fan of the first movie', well this isn't the first movie, its a different movie, stop comparing them! 

Anchorman received a big cult following for a reason, it was hilarious, awkward, weird and completely random in places. It has to to be said its one of my favorite ever comedies. 

But seriously!? What did you expect, something completely different? No! I didn't! I didn't want something completely different. I wanted more Ron burgundy, and plenty more brick tamland, which is what we got. Personally loved the film and cant understand why anybody didn't enjoy the original wouldn't like it too (unless you seem to think a movie called Anchorman 2, yes thats 2, needed to be something completely new and off the wall). 

Sometimes think people need to get there head out there arse and just watch a film for the pure entertainment purposes it was made for.

Rant over. 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":171888,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

horror flick","reviewBody":"Watched it last night, with pretty much no great expectations of it. Maybe a scare or too, but I really was expecting poor acting. Yet, to my surprise the movie holds its own very nicely. Good acting by all, the girls were cute, with some decent nudity as well, which always adds a little to a good horror flick. The best thing about this movie was its ability to use Paranoia. Not necessarily the Hitchcock form, but still for a big budget horror movie, its vibe and atmosphere is very solid. I found myself being a little scared, for no apparent reason, which is a good thing for a horror/slasher to do. overall, good movie, good young acting, great scares, and just a cool movie to chill and watch with some friends. check it out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37071,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

groin","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1229340/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ajk08"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Snobs","reviewBody":"Sick to death of reading reviews starting with 'I was a massive fan of the first movie', well this isn't the first movie, its a different movie, stop comparing them! 

Anchorman received a big cult following for a reason, it was hilarious, awkward, weird and completely random in places. It has to to be said its one of my favorite ever comedies. 

But seriously!? What did you expect, something completely different? No! I didn't! I didn't want something completely different. I wanted more Ron burgundy, and plenty more brick tamland, which is what we got. Personally loved the film and cant understand why anybody didn't enjoy the original wouldn't like it too (unless you seem to think a movie called Anchorman 2, yes thats 2, needed to be something completely new and off the wall). 

Sometimes think people need to get there head out there arse and just watch a film for the pure entertainment purposes it was made for.

Rant over. 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":171888,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="
